tasks.label: Stop All CRM Servers
tasks.command: pkill -f 'npm run dev' && lsof -ti:3000,3001 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true

tasks.label: Check Server Status
tasks.command: echo '=== Port Status ===' && lsof -i:3000,3001 && echo '\n=== Process Status ===' && ps aux | grep -E '(nest|3000|3001)' | grep -v grep

tasks.label: ðŸ§¹ Clean & Restart
tasks.command: pkill -f 'npm run dev' 2>/dev/null || true && rm -rf apps/frontend/.next/cache && echo 'âœ… Cleaned cache' && ./start-dev-robust.sh

tasks.label: ðŸ“¦ Fresh Install
tasks.command: rm -rf node_modules apps/*/node_modules packages/*/node_modules && npm install

tasks.label: Quick Status
tasks.command: echo "=== Ports ===" && lsof -nP -iTCP:3001,3005 -sTCP:LISTEN || true && echo "\n=== HTTP checks ===" && curl -sSf http://localhost:3001/api/health && echo && curl -sSf http://localhost:3005/api/health || true

tasks.label: Reload Inbox Health
tasks.command: echo "=== HTTP checks ===" && curl -sSf http://localhost:3001/api/health && echo && curl -sSf http://localhost:3005/dashboard/inbox | head -n 3 || true

tasks.label: Check Server Status
tasks.command: echo '=== Port Status ===' && lsof -i:3000,3001 && echo '\n=== Process Status ===' && ps aux | grep -E '(nest|3000|3001)' | grep -v grep
